import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

X = df['BG'].value_counts().index
Y = df['BG'].value_counts()
fig = plt.figure()
ax = fig.add_axes([0, 0, 1, 1])
ax.bar(X, Y)
plt.show()

source.e4c63aae:
fig2 = plt.figure()
ax2 = fig2.add_axes([0, 0, 1, 1])
colors = plt.get_cmap('YlGn')(np.linspace(0.2, 0.7, len(X)))
ax2.pie(Y, labels=X, labeldistance=0.5, colors=colors, wedgeprops={"linewidth": 1, "edgecolor": "white"}, textprops={'fontsize':16, 'color':'Black'})
ax2.set_title("Blood Groups Distribution", fontsize=20)
texts =  textprops=dict(color="w")
plt.show()
